name: Banner Ad Slideshow
author: Awodeyi Adewale Emmanuel

sections.description:
This plugin is all-in-one slider solution for WordPress that create responsive(Premium Features) banners.

Free Version features:

  • * Use shortcode to add it to any page at frontend.
  • * Click ‘Add new banner’ under ‘Banner Ad Slideshow’ menu at admin page to insert banner.

Premium Features:

  • * All of the above free version features.
  • * Click ‘Banner Settings’ under ‘Banner Ad Slideshow’ menu at admin page for configuration.
  • * Banner Ad Slideshow looks responsive on any device.
  • * The Banner Ad Slideshow description added.
  • * The Banner Ad Slideshow URL added.
  • * The Banner Ad Slideshow Expiring date added.
  • * Click ‘Banner Manager’ under ‘Banner Ad Slideshow’ to Enable / Disable banner Status.
  • * Click ‘Banner Manager’ under ‘Banner Ad Slideshow’ to delete banner.
  • * Click ‘Banner Manager’ under ‘Banner Ad Slideshow’ to edit banner description, URL etc.
  • * No cron job require to automate banner expiring date
sections.installation:
• 1. Upload files of Banner Ad Slideshow to the `/wp-content/plugins/`
  • 2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • 3. At backend or admin page, put ShortCode /*[banner_ad_slideshow]*/ to add Banner Ad Slideshow to the page. Please always remember
    to remove [/* */] from the Shortcode.
  • 4. At frontend, put ShortCode /*if ( shortcode_exists( ‘banner_ad_slideshow’ ) ) { echo do_shortcode(‘[banner_ad_slideshow]’);} */ to
    add Banner Ad Slideshow to the page. Please always remember to remove [/* */] from the Shortcode.
  • 5. At backend , click ‘Help’ under ‘Banner Ad Slideshow’ menu in WordPress for help user guide.
sections.faq:
Does Banner Ad Slideshow work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it does. You can use it with any WordPress theme.

Do I get free support for this free plugin?

Yes, we can provide support via email and chat if needed.
